At the Black fortress, Rat Trap quietly skulks into the crevace as he sniff=
s the air around him, sitting on his hind legs, looking all around, then ba=
ck to Windlord.  He seems uneasy and crouches low.

" I dunno about you Win=
dlord, but I got this strange feeling that we're definitely be'n watched.  =
We need a signature scrambler pronto, and wheels is the only one who's got =
it.  Anyway, until then, we gotta move on, danger or no danger.  Now, I nee=
d ta find that little control pannel I found before... Hmmm, this ain't fam=
illiar, I think we're at the opposite side of the fortress..  But there's g=
otta be more than one control pannel box, right?  Think ya might know where=
 ta find it?"

Outside the fortress, some distance away, Tucson's radar pic=
ks up on Deepstryke and Phobia as does Night Shifts.  But instead of fear a=
nd apprehension, both Autobots stand their ground firmly, along with Kup an=
d Talon.

Tucson could hear the taunts of Hydras, yet they do not bother hi=
m.  He stands with a solid stance, one that states, "I'm not intimidated by=
 you in the least."  He slowly draws his blade from behind his back.

"Word=
s, Hydras, that's all they are.  It's too bad you hide behind them like a t=
urtle in a shell. "

Without much show of emotion, Tucson narrows an optic,=
 and turns up the frequency on his sonar emitter, thus making the signal mu=
ch stronger, and powerful enough to span over near Deepstryke and Phobia, i=
n an attempt to disorientate them as well.  While doing that, he keeps full=
 concentration on Hydras.

"Talon, Night Shift, Kup, Straight Shot, I'd lik=
e you to teach Deepstryke and Phobia a lesson in picking on someone their o=
wn size. I'll handle Hydras."

Night Shift and Straight Shot gasp.

"Whoahh=
h, big guy, ohh that's not good, ya can't take Hydras yourself, that's suic=
ide!"

Straight Shot appears worried.

"I knew you'd try something like tha=
t!  Night Shift's right!  Rodimus also told you not ta try and bite off mor=
e than you can chew!"

Tucson readies himself for a battle.

" I'll be fine=
, don't worry.  I didn't get my name for nothing."

Night Shift didn't want=
 any part of Tucson throwing himself into the dragon's lair.  He knew what =
had to be done, and against Tucson's orders, he reaches out to Rodimus.

"N=
IGHT SHIFT TA RODIMUS OVER!  I THINK YA BETTER SET UP SOME SERIOUS SECURITY=
 AT THE ARK, 'CAUSE WE'RE GONNA NEED YA HERE!  TUCSON'S WAITN' FOR HYDRAS A=
ND HE'S LOOKN' TA GO ONE ON ONE WITH 'EM!"

Tucson says nothing to Night Sh=
ift.  Deep down he knew his friend was right and he was taking an unecesary=
 risk.  Yet he felt obligated to do it.

Back at the Ark, Quickstride shake=
s his head, as the darkness lifts, and he can hear and see again.  He snort=
s.

" Talk about a serious system glitch.   What the pit was that?"

He cou=
ld now see and hear Rodimus.

"I'm okay Rodimus, I - think it was just a gl=
itch, not sure really..  Anyway, someone is definitely here, but I'm sure I=
 can handle things here.  You better go assist Night Shift and the others. =
 He said something about - Tucson waiting for Hydras... Sorry, overheard th=
e com, can't help it."

Back at the battle ground, Straight Shot could hard=
ly believe what Tucson was doing.  They had been together for vorns and now=
, it appeared that in a split second, she could lose her life long friend.
=

"Talon, you gotta do something!  Talk him out of it!  I know what he's doi=
ng and it's certain destruction if he does!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> HYDRAS
> 
> Hydras cursed =
and said by all Predacon Channels "SPread and take defensive positions try =
to encircle the maximals and shut them down, Kill in sight..." Then opening=
 comlink to Tucson said  with a taunting voice"Ahhh Irt seems that you fina=
lly decided to pay a visit"
> 
> From: Super Cyclonus 
> Sent: Wednesday, D=
ecember 22, 2010 11:25 AM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Subject: Re: Oper=
ation Black Tower
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Two sweeps continue to fly over head, risin=
g further and further into the air. They are out numbered now by the Maxima=
ls and Autobots below them, and it would seem that their perilous situation=
 is becoming clear to them. At the last moment they appear to be about to t=
urn tail and run, but the rapid fire prowess from Kup, Nightshift and Talon=
 quickly bring down the last of the two sweeps, twin contrails of smoke mar=
k their demise as they spiral towards the ground some distance away.
> 
> H=
owever in the distance back up forces continue to close the distance, the l=
arge form of Deepstryke in his cannon mode, followed by Phobia and several =
sweeps all in aerial modes can easily be seen as they approach!
> 
> ******=
*******************************************************
> 
> Meanwhile, hig=
h up on the wall of the dark tower, Rat Trap and Windlord continue their at=
tempts to break in. Using Rat Trap's acid, the wall sizzles slightly as a l=
ittle of the metal buckles under the assault from the acid. However there i=
s only a little of it, so the affects are small.
> 
> Windlord, adding his =
feather, sticking it in the crevasse created by the acid and creating a sma=
ll explosion is able to create a small crack in the wall, one just large en=
ough to fit a rat, and perhaps a small bird!
> 
> At the same time both of =
them can hear the sound of a ship approaching the tower, a shuttlecraft, th=
e IFF marking revealing it to be Predacon!
> 
> ***************************=
**********************************
> 
> 
> Hydras and Cyclonus continue the=
ir conversation as Hydras' shuttle closes its distance.
> 
> > Hydras Just =
arrived towards the BlackFortress
> > and opening comlink to his men he sai=
d "Here
> > is Hydras, Try to sorrund the enemie... that
> > will made them=
 an easier target "
> 
> Cyclonus' voice comes over Hydras' speakers, "Um s=
ir, you have most of our forces with you. I have deployed all of the forces=
 I have except for Scourge and Myself. We will be face the enemy as they at=
tempt to close with the base itself." 
> 
> As Hydras' ship approaches the =
tower, Iguanus comments, "Sir, I am picking up two Maximal energy signature=
s high up on the wall towards the top."
> 
> Tarantulus nods, "Yes, and I t=
hink I see evidence of some sort of small ordinance detonation. They are pr=
obably trying to breach the walls!"
> 
> **********************************=
***************************
> 
> Back at the Ark Quickstride is quickly gra=
sp one thing, it is extremely dark, pitch black! There is absolutely no lig=
ht! If it wasn't for his internal maintenance systems he might even think h=
is optic sensors had been turned off.
> 
> Another interesting fact is that=
 he cannot hear anything either. He can hear NO reply from Rodimus Prime, b=
ut more than that, he cannot even hear the sound of his own voice as he tri=
es to talk or the obvious movements he himself was making.  
> 
> Then the =
darkness began to fade becoming more like a supra dense fog that is beginni=
ng to lift, dimly Rodimus' voice can be heard comming from somewhere, "Quic=
kstride!! Quickstride!!"
> 
> OOC: If I have left something out or made a w=
rong assumption about someone's actions please let me know. A lot to keep t=
rack of at once. 
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
